typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MainorBranch as string,
		CompanyNameArabic as string,
		CompanyNameEnglish as string,
		CommercialRegistrationNo as string,
		CommercialLicensenumber as string,
		Area as string,
		StreetName as string,
		AreaNumber as string,
		StreetNumber2 as string,
		BuildingNumber as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		Fax as string,
		{P.O.Box} as string,
		Email as string,
		Website as string,
		MapLocationUrl as string,
		ID_SK as integer,
		DS_FILENAME as string,
		DT_FILETIME as timestamp,
		ID_ERROR_CODE as integer,
		DS_ERROR_CODE as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: true) ~> stgwarehouseerrorlog
stgwarehouseerrorlog derive(DS_FILENAME = replace(DS_FILENAME,'.','_warehouse_err.')) ~> dsfilename
dsfilename sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'DS_FILENAME',
	umask: 0777,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		MainorBranch,
		CompanyNameArabic,
		CompanyNameEnglish,
		CommercialRegistrationNo,
		CommercialLicensenumber,
		Area,
		StreetName,
		AreaNumber,
		StreetNumber2,
		BuildingNumber,
		PhoneNumber,
		Fax,
		Box = {P.O.Box},
		Email,
		Website,
		MapLocationUrl,
		DS_ERROR_CODE
	)) ~> errorlogwarehouse
